type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike
[i]Rightful Heir [/i]– When Lucina, Exalt of Ylisse enters, you become the monarch. 
[i]Foresight[/i] – Whenever you draw your second card each turn, target creature can't be blocked until your next turn and is goaded.
[i]The[/i] [i]Fire Emblem[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, other creatures you control get+2/+2. Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a a player this turn, untap them.
